languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс шумно выдыхает, сверля взглядом Ирлиэт. Наконец, он нехотя, очень нехотя кивает.{/n} "Возможно. Жаль, что не было другой кандидатуры".
{n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс шумно выдыхает, сверля взглядом Ирлиэт. Наконец, он нехотя, очень нехотя кивает.{/n} "Возможно. Жаль, что не было другой кандидатуры".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは音を立てて息を吐き、ユリエットを睨みつけた。最後に、彼は明らかに不本意そうにうなずいた。{/n}「あなたが正しいのかもしれない。ただ他のやつだったら良かったんだがな」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは音を立てて息を吐き、ユリエットを睨みつけた。最後に、彼は明らかに不本意そうにうなずいた。{/n}「あなたが正しいのかもしれない。ただ他のやつだったら良かったんだがな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希狠狠地呼了一口气，怒视着伊莉耶特。到最后，他带着明显的不情愿，点了点头。{/n}“或许你说得没错，我也希望能有别的候选人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希狠狠地呼了一口气，怒视着伊莉耶特。到最后，他带着明显的不情愿，点了点头。{/n}“或许你说得没错，我也希望能有别的候选人。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix exhala ruidosamente, lanzando una mirada furibunda a Yrliet. Finalmente, asiente con evidente reticencia.{/n} «Puede que tenga razón, pero ojalá hubiera otra opción».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix exhala ruidosamente, lanzando una mirada furibunda a Yrliet. Finalmente, asiente con evidente reticencia.{/n} «Puede que tenga razón. Ojalá hubiera otro candidato».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix atmet hörbar aus und starrt Yrliet böse an. Schließlich nickt er mit offensichtlichem Widerwillen.{/n} "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Ich wünschte, es hätte noch einen Kandidaten gegeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix atmet lauthals aus und starrt Yrliet böse an. Schließlich nickt er mit offensichtlichem Widerwillen.{/n} "Vielleicht habt Ihr recht. Ich wünschte, es gäbe einen anderen Kandidaten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix pousse un long soupir sans pour autant cesser de foudroyer Yrliet du regard. Il finit néanmoins par hocher la tête, bien qu'avec réticence.{/n} « Vous avez sans doute raison. Cela dit, j'aurais préféré quelqu'un d'autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix pousse un long soupir sans pour autant cesser de foudroyer Yrliet du regard. Il finit néanmoins par hocher la tête, bien qu'avec réticence.{/n} « Vous avez sans doute raison. Cela dit, j'aurais préféré quelqu'un d'autre. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, duyulur bir biçimde nefes verip Yrliet'e ters ters bakıyor. Nihayetinde gönülsüzlüğü bariz bir şekilde, başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Haklı olabilirsin. Keşke başka bir seçeneğimiz olsaymış."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix exhales noisily, glaring at Yrliet. Finally, he nods with obvious reluctance.{/n} "You may be right. I wish there were another candidate."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
